article_title: Bob Baucom, Concord’s beloved ‘Santa’ was Hospice champion
article_text:

og.description: CONCORD, N.C. – One of Santa's chief helpers in Cabarrus County has died. Bobby Ray Baucom, 80, passed away at his Miller Avenue home Friday morning after six years of battling pulmonary fibrosis.
